description: [``botocore``] Transcribe and Transcribe Call Analytics now support automatic language identification along with custom vocabulary, vocabulary filter, custom language model and PII redaction.
[``botocore``] Added Monitoring support for SQL Server Failover Cluster Instance. Additionally, added a new API to allow one-click monitoring of containers resources.
[``botocore``] This release added new attributes to Rekognition Video GetCelebrityRecognition API operations.
[``botocore``] Amazon Connect Chat now supports real-time message streaming.
[``botocore``] Support added for AMI sharing with organizations and organizational units in ModifyImageAttribute API
